fields.title: Pet Adoption
fields.description: This single page app allows you to filter by pet type, and even add your own pet!
fields.technologies_used: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

fields.title: Group Project: Band Websites-Battleheart
fields.description: Welcome to the website for the band Battleheart!  This was my first group project at NSS.
fields.technologies_used: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

fields.title: Group Project: Chatty
fields.description: This is a simple chat app that allows the user to switch between profile perspectives.
fields.technologies_used: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

fields.title: Sorting Hat
fields.description: Just like the Sorting Hat in the Harry Potter series, this app will take your name and assign you to a Hogwarts house.  Students can also be expelled so be on your best behavior!
fields.technologies_used: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

fields.title: Bear Watcher
fields.description: Track bears in the Katmai National Park in Alaska and watch as they feast on countless salmon.
fields.technologies_used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript ES6 Modules, Version Control with Github

fields.title: Firebase Pinterest
fields.description: Keep a virtual collection of interests and ideas with this simulation of Pinterest that uses Firebase and showcases full CRUD.
fields.technologies_used: Git, HTML, CSS, Webpack, JavaScript ES6 Modules, and Firebase.

fields.title: Apparty
fields.description: A socially distant birthday tracking and celebration app.  Create a birthday event for a friend, invite all your other friends, and remind that special someone that life still has meaning!
fields.technologies_used: React, React Router DOM, Bootstrap/reactstrap, Moment.js, Axios, Firebase, Cloudinary, HTML, CSS/SCSS
